string.text:
The DDM4 V7 AR15 style firearm features M-LOK attachment technology with the Daniel Defense MFR 15.0 rail. Built around a Cold Hammer Forged, 16 inch barrel, the V7 has a DD improved Flash Suppressor to reduce flash signature.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes for Picatini rail
